Title: Relates to gifted and bright neurologically diverse pupils; repealer
Summary: Relates to gifted and bright neurologically diverse pupils with special needs; directs the education department to assist districts in meeting the educational and mental health needs equally of both general education and bright neurologically diverse pupils.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to gifted and bright neurologically diverse pupils with special needs; and to repeal certain provisions of such law relating thereto
